title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - "...someone coughed"

content.question: Near the bottom of paragraph 1, the words "perhaps someone coughed, or the sound of a car horn, or a curse from the streets came in" have which of the following effects?

choices.label: They retard the tempo of the speaker's prose.
They satirize the faith of the churchgoers.
They change, for a moment, the point of view of the speaker.
They emphasize, by contrast, the hushed silence in the church.

content.answer: They emphasize, by contrast, the hushed silence in the church.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
